text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Wow!
It's usually crowded, but it's empty~!

Hehe... it's the perfect... time slot...
I looked it up online...!

Thank you, Tenka-chan.
Thanks to you, I can enjoy it at a leisurely pace.

Hehe, Amana-chan,
you've brought a lot of stuff.
Ehehe... I got curious about a lot of things.
...Oh, I see. Do you like books?

Hmm... I wonder... Sometimes I'd take a chance and try reading
difficult books, even though I wouldn't understand the content.

Even though I shouldn't have understood it... when I opened them,
every book looked sparkling to me.

...Amana, you didn't really have many things you wanted to do
or dreams for the future, right?

So... I guess those experiences...
...were enjoyable for you.

...Amana, it's wonderful... you've met the authors
of the books you've read, right...?

...Both of you... come here...!
I want to show you something...
Wow... it's lovely...!

Y-Yeah...! Among these... knick-knacks and accessories...
I thought... Chiyuki-san... would like them...

Thank you, Tenka-chan.
I love decorations like these flowers...!

Chiyuki-san would look good with them~!
Hey, hey, let's buy something.

Oh...
well...

I'm hesitant...
but... I didn't plan to do that today...
Aww, but they're so cute!

Thank you...!
Let's get back to choosing books.
